name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII

participants.name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII
participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII"}

agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: JHR 120 CHAIR: Rep. Toni Rose The Appropriations Subcommittee on Articles VI, VII, & VIII will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The Subcommittee will be working on Articles VII and Article VIII. The subcommittee may take up pending items. As a reminder, no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
